lead_paragraph: Barcelona coach Luis Enrique gave an upbeat message ahead of Tuesday's Champions League game at Manchester City despite being without Gerard Pique, Jordi Alba, Jeremy Mathieu, Andres Iniesta and Aleix Vidal through injury.

headline.print_headline: Luis Enrique Upbeat Despite Injuries to Barca Quintet
headline.main: Luis Enrique Upbeat Despite Injuries to Barca Quintet

snippet: Barcelona coach Luis Enrique gave an upbeat message ahead of Tuesday's Champions League game at Manchester City despite being without Gerard Pique, Jordi Alba, Jeremy Mathieu, Andres Iniesta and Aleix Vidal through injury....
